messages.title: Our NHS is under threat with the Conservatives...
messages.content: Senior Conservatives have openly attacked the NHS. It's clear that the Conservatives can't be trusted to safeguard the future of our NHS.

messages.title: It’s Claire or Conservative here...
messages.content: The election in our area is set to be a close race between Lib Dem Claire Kelley and the Conservative candidate. Only Claire Kelley can beat the Conservatives.

messages.title: It’s a two-horse race
messages.content: Labour can’t win in our area.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election in our area is set to be a close race between Lib Dem Claire Kelley and the Conservative candidate. Labour are a distant third here. They have no councillors locally and are 10/1 outsiders. Only Claire Kelley can beat the Conservatives.

issues.health: Senior Conservatives have openly attacked the NHS. It's clear that the Conservatives can't be trusted to safeguard the future of our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Claire Kelley has lived and worked locally in Harrogate for over twenty years. She raised her children, Emily and Alex, in the town. Claire Kelley will be a strong, independently-minded voice for our area. Like Phil Willis MP, she will speak out on issues that matter to local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Claire Kelley has campaigned alongside popular MP Phil Willis for many years. Claire and Phil have been fighting against cuts by Conservative-led North Yorkshire Council to support for stroke victims and their carers.

contactInformation.address: CLAIRE KELLEY, Liberal Democrats, FREEPOST LS6425, Harrogate, HG1 5BR

endorsements.endorsement: I have worked closely with Claire Kelley for years. Claire cares passionately about our area and I know that she would be a first class MP for local people.
I used to vote Conservative, but I've been so impressed by how hard Claire Kelley works. I'm backing Claire Kelley this time.

endorsements.endorser: Mrs and Mrs Gill of Knaresborough
endorsements.endorsement: We’ve voted for Phil Willis and the Lib Dems for many years. Claire Kelley puts the work into fighting to carry on all his good work locally.
I've supported Labour in the past, but I know they can't win here. I'm backing the Lib. Dem. this time to keep the Conservatives out.

images.caption: Endorsement by Mr. Doveston of Harrogate
Endorsement by Mrs and Mrs Gill of Knaresborough
Endorsement by Mrs Grant of Harrogate
